subs.text: I have an app called Server Monitor that does something simple but important. It pings each of the apps I have running once a minute to see if they're still alive. If not, SM sends me an email. I bet everyone who writes server apps has this kind of utility.
I'd like something like this for my friends. A ping goes out to each, if someone doesn't respond, I get an email.
In the age of The Trump Plague, I worry about my friends. I figure it's just a matter of time...
